title: Print, "Tombeau monumental avec urne funéraire au premier plan", 1768, published 1770
signed: Signed in plate, lower left: J.L Le Geay invs et Sculps.
inscribed: Inscribed in red crayon, upper right: 10
description: One of a suite of 26 plates of urns, vases, tombs and fragments of sculpture set among classical ruins, heavily overgrown with vegetation. Suite divided into three parts. Tomb pictured center right behind vegetation ornamented with horizontal friezes with figures and a plaque.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Tombeau monumental avec urne funéraire au premier plan", 1768, published 1770.
1768, published 1770. Etching on off-white laid paper. Gift of Whitney Warren. 1958-136-1-j.
